verses.text: Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and this \add is\add* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* to gather \w together|strong="H3664"\w* the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and he \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w masons|strong="H2672"\w* to \w hew|strong="H2672"\w* \w wrought|strong="H1496"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* for the \w nails|strong="H4548"\w* for the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, and for the \w joinings|strong="H4226"\w*; and \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* without \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*;

Also \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H0369"\w*: for the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w* and they of \w Tyre|strong="H6876"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w much|strong="H7230"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add is\add* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* and \w tender|strong="H7390"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add that is\add* to be \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add must be\add* \w exceeding|strong="H4605"\w* \w magnifical|strong="H1431"\w*, of \w fame|strong="H8034"\w* and of \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* throughout all \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*: I will \add therefore\add* now make \w preparation|strong="H3559"\w* for it. So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H7230"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

¶ Then he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* him to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, as for me, it was in my \w mind|strong="H3824"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

But the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou hast \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H7230"\w*, and hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wars|strong="H4421"\w*: thou shalt not \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, because thou hast \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

Behold, a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* shall be \w born|strong="H3205"\w* to thee, who shall be a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*; and I will give him \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* from all his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: for his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall be \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* and \w quietness|strong="H8253"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in his \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft Solomon: that is, Peaceable\f*

He shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; and he shall be my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and I \add will be\add* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; and I will \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Now, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be with thee; and \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* thou, and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as he hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* of thee.

Only the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w wisdom|strong="H7922"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*, and give thee \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* concerning \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that thou mayest \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Then shalt thou \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, if thou takest \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to \w fulfil|strong="H6213"\w* the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* with concerning \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, and of good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*; \w dread|strong="H3372"\w* not, nor be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*.

Now, behold, in my \w trouble|strong="H6040"\w* I have \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; and of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* and \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* without \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*; for it is in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*: \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* also and \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* have I \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*; and thou mayest \w add|strong="H3254"\w* thereto.\f + \fr 22.14 \ft trouble: or, poverty\f*

Moreover \add there are\add* \w workmen|strong="H6213"\w* with thee in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, \w hewers|strong="H2672"\w* and \w workers|strong="H2796"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* and \w timber|strong="H6086"\w*, and all manner of cunning \w men|strong="H2450"\w* for every manner of \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.\f + \fr 22.15 \ft workers…: that is, masons and carpenters\f*

Of the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and the \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \add there is\add* no \w number|strong="H4557"\w*. \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* \add therefore\add*, and be \w doing|strong="H6213"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be with thee.

¶ \w David|strong="H1732"\w* also \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \add saying\add*,

\add Is\add* not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with you? and hath he \add not\add* given you \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*? for he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w subdued|strong="H3533"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Now \w set|strong="H5414"\w* your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* therefore, and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* ye the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that is to be \w built|strong="H1129"\w* to the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
